content.rendered:
Resources shared during the webinar:

  • Slides: Click here for a copy of the slide deck from the presentation.
  • More Q&A opportunities: If you have a question that we weren’t able to get to in the webinar, consider joining us for Virtual Fair Office Hours, held weekly on Thursdays, where we’ll be happy to follow up.
  • Employer training: We’re hosted another virtual fair training for employers on August 19th. Our template for inviting employers to your virtual fairs has been updated to include the recording link!
  • Villanova FAQs & Surveys: Check out the resources Sam Wheeler from Villanova mentioned here!
  • More resources: Be sure to check out the Virtual Fair Launch Kit for videos, templates, blog posts, and more to help you launch your fair

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Webinar recording of training on our new virtual fair tools, an overview of our roadmap of new virtual fair updates through the fall, and best practices from our inaugural virtual fair with the Big East, featuring Samantha Wheeler from Villanova University.
